author: cbs8
title: Attend Mike Huckabee Town Hall in Newberry SC and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry, SC offers convenient lodging for guests attending the Mike Huckabee Town Hall in Newberry on September 22, NEWBERRY, SC, September 04, Guests attending the Mike Huckabee Town Hall in Newberry, South Carolina on September 22 will find convenient lodging at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry. The South Carolina Republican Party will host presidential candidate and former Arkansas Governor, Mike Huckabee, in a First in the South Presidential Town Hall Series. The event will take place at the Newberry Opera House at 7pm.
"We are happy to welcome guests who are in town for the Mike Huckabee Town Hall meeting," shares Ambria Lanteigne, General Manager of the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC hotel . "Our award winning property is located just five minutes from the historic Newberry Opera House," explains Ms. Lanteigne.
The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry features stylish guest rooms with microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Travelers will rest in comfort on Simply Smart beds. The complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar includes many healthy breakfast options. Hotel amenities fitness center, and coin laundry. Snacks, beverages, and convenience items may be purchased at the 24-hour sundry shop in the lobby. This top hotel near downtown Newberry received a 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Nearby points of interest include Newberry College, Enoree River Winery, and Lake Murray.
Current hotel specials include the Romantic Escape Package and Book Early and Save. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points toward free hotel nights. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry is located off I-26 at Exit 76.
For more information about the Town Hall with Mike Huckabee, call the SC Republican Party at (803)988-8440 Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry South Carolina hotel , call 803-321-3955 or visit www.NEWBERRYSOUTHCAROLINAHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel Newberry
The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel in Newberry is the premier choice among Newberry South Carolina hotels. They are conveniently located at exit 76 off of I-26, about 30 minutes north of Columbia and less than an hour south of Greenville, SC. This Newberry SC hotel has outstanding amenities, including an indoor pool, whirlpool and Fitness Center. Guest should be sure to stop by their complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar each morning for delights like their signature cinnamon rolls and Smart Roast coffee. Few other Newberry South Carolina hotels can provide travelers with these perks backed by the reputable name they trust. "Stay Smart" at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel.
 //www.NewberrySouthCarolinaHotel.com
